Description.Text: Other services/amenities: Traditional suites have Wi-Fi, air conditioning, safety box, satellite TV with flat screen, spacious terrace or balcony with unobstructed views to the Caldera but also to Mediterranean Sea, fully equipped kitchenette fridge, direct dial telephone, hair dryer.
Kalestesia Suites are only 150 metres from Akrotiri village. Within a 10-km distance, you will find Fira, the airport and the port, as well as the beaches of Kamari, Perissa and Perivolos.
